description: Close to the town centre and within walking distance of the Duomo, this restaurant is housed in a beautiful historic palazzo. The cuisine is delicious, with a menu featuring fish dishes (depending on market availability) and a few more traditional recipes such as sweet tortelli and the excellent nettle and angler fish gnudi. The friendly welcome and streamlined service explain the restaurant’s popularity at both lunch and dinner, so booking is recommended!
